verses.text: Holy Bible! book divine! Precious treasure, thou art mine ! Mine, to tell me whence I came; Mine, to teach me what I am.
Mine, to chide me when I rove; Mine, to show a Savior's love; Mine, art thou to guide my feet; Mine, to judge, condemn, acquit.
Mine, to comfort in distress, If the Holy Spirit bless; Mine, to show, by living faith, Man can triumph over death.
Mine, to tell of joys to come, And the rebel sinner's doom; O thou precious Book divine, Precious treasure, thou art mine !
